box.appendChild(content); document.body.appendChild(box); // Draggable functionality let isDragging = false; let offsetX = 0, offsetY = 0; box.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => { if (e.target === closeBtn) return; // Don't drag when clicking close button isDragging = true; offsetX = e.clientX - box.getBoundingClientRect().left; offsetY = e.clientY - box.getBoundingClientRect().top; box.style.transition = 'none'; }); document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => { if (isDragging) { box.style.left = `${e.clientX - offsetX}px`; box.style.top = `${e.clientY - offsetY}px`; box.style.right = 'auto'; box.style.bottom = 'auto'; } }); document.addEventListener('mouseup', () => { isDragging = false; box.style.transition = 'all 0.1s ease'; }); function injectTooltipStyles() { if (document.getElementById("tooltipStyles")) return; const style = document.createElement("style"); style.id = "tooltipStyles"; style.textContent = ` .hover-value { border-bottom: 1px dotted #D4AF37; /* Gold underline */ cursor: help; position: relative; } .hover-value::after { content: attr(data-tooltip); position: absolute; background: #0A2463; /* Dark blue */ color: #FFFFFF; padding: 6px 10px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; /* Intel report style */ border: 1px solid #D4AF37; /* Gold border */ border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); white-space: nowrap; opacity: 0; pointer-events: none; top: -32px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); z-index: 10001; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; } .hover-value:hover::after { opacity: 1; } .stat-row { margin: 10px 0; padding: 5px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-left: 3px solid #D4AF37; line-height: 1.4; transition: background 0.2s ease; } .stat-row:hover { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } `; document.head.appendChild(style); } // Variable descriptions for tooltips const VARIABLE_DESCRIPTIONS = { 'victories': 'Major victories achieved during term', 'conquests': 'Progress on Clark administration agenda', 'neoliberalism': 'How much neoliberals have influenced your administration', 'nato leverage': 'How much control do you exert over your allies', 'russian hostility': 'Diplomatic tension with Russia' }; function createScoreElement(label, value, container) { injectTooltipStyles(); let statusMessage; switch(label.toLowerCase()) { case 'victories': statusMessage = value > 8 ? `You've conquered Olympus` : value > 3 ? `You've collected the spoils` : `You lament`; break; case 'conquests': statusMessage = value > 5 ? `Congress bows before you` : value > 1 ? `Congress is weak but brave enough to stand in your way` : `Congress smells weakness and is unwilling to yield an inch`; break; case 'neoliberalism': statusMessage = value > 5 ? `You've embraced neoliberalism` : value > 2 ? `You've let neoliberal allies sway your decisions` : `Neoliberals feel left out of your administration`; break; case 'nato leverage': statusMessage = value > 5 ? `You have full command of NATO after impressing your allies` : value > 2 ? `NATO respects you after exercising leadership` : `NATO is reluctant to work with you`; break; case 'russian hostility': statusMessage = value > 5 ? `Cracks in the Earth are forming after you've torched relations` : value > 2 ? `Putin is furious with your reckless antics` : `The Russian menace is calm but suspicious of you`; break; default: statusMessage = `${value}`; } const row = document.createElement('div'); row.className = 'stat-row'; row.innerHTML = ` ${label} : ${value} `; container.appendChild(row); } function updateStatsPopup() { content.innerHTML = ''; createScoreElement('Victories', Win, content); createScoreElement('Conquests', Agenda, content); createScoreElement('Neoliberalism', Neo, content); createScoreElement('NATO Leverage', Nato, content); createScoreElement('Russian Hostility', Russia, content); } window.updateStatsPopup = updateStatsPopup; updateStatsPopup(); function addHeadquarterButton() { if (document.getElementById('headquarter_button')) return; const refButton = document.getElementById('view_electoral_map'); if (!refButton) return; let buttonlabel = 'Your Administration'; if ([0, 7, 9, 14].includes(e.noCounter)) { buttonlabel = '! Your Administration'; } const newButton = document.createElement('button'); newButton.id = 'headquarter_button'; newButton.style.cssText = ` margin-left: 1.5em; position: static !important; display: inline-block !important; `; newButton.innerHTML = buttonlabel; newButton.addEventListener('click', openHeadquarter); // Insert in consistent position if (document.getElementById('stats_popup_button')) { document.getElementById('stats_popup_button').before(newButton); } else { refButton.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', newButton); } } function addStatsPopupButton() { if (document.getElementById('stats_popup_button')) return; const refButton = document.getElementById('headquarter_button') || document.getElementById('view_electoral_map'); if (!refButton) return; const newButton = document.createElement('button'); newButton.id = 'stats_popup_button'; newButton.style.cssText = ` margin-left: 1.5em; position: static !important; display: inline-block !important; `; newButton.innerHTML = 'Status Report'; newButton.addEventListener('click', toggleStatsPopup); // Always insert after headquarter button refButton.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', newButton); } function toggleStatsPopup() { const box = document.getElementById('draggable-box'); if (box.style.display === 'none' || !box.style.display) { box.style.display = 'block'; } else { box.style.display = 'none'; } } function openHeadquarter() { let questions = document.querySelector(".inner_window_question"); questions.style.display = 'none'; const existingHqDiv = document.getElementById('headquarter'); if (existingHqDiv) { existingHqDiv.remove(); } const hqButton = document.getElementById('headquarter_button'); if (hqButton) { hqButton.remove(); } // Create and set up the headquarters div let hqDiv = document.createElement('div'); hqDiv.id = 'headquarter'; hqDiv.style.display = 'flex'; hqDiv.style.color = 'white'; hqDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#383838'; hqDiv.style.backgroundImage = 'url(https://i.imgur.com/F6xHPXG.jpeg)'; hqDiv.style.backgroundSize = 'cover'; hqDiv.style.border = '5px solid rgb(23, 55, 107)'; hqDiv.style.borderRadius = '10px'; hqDiv.style.height = '54%'; hqDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; hqDiv.style.alignItems = 'center'; hqDiv.style.position = 'relative'; // Create header div let headerDiv = document.createElement('div'); headerDiv.style.display = 'flex'; headerDiv.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; headerDiv.style.width = '100%'; headerDiv.style.alignItems = 'center'; // Add back button to the header let backButton = document.createElement('button'); backButton.innerText = 'Back'; backButton.style.margin = '5px'; backButton.style.backgroundColor = 'grey'; backButton.style.position = 'absolute'; backButton.style.top = '16px'; backButton.style.left = '10px'; backButton.onclick = function() { hqDiv.remove(); questions.style.display = ''; } headerDiv.appendChild(backButton); // Add a button to switch to the Congressional Makeup page let congressButton = document.createElement('button'); congressButton.innerText = 'Battle for Olympus'; congressButton.style.margin = '5px'; congressButton.style.backgroundColor = 'grey'; congressButton.style.position = 'absolute'; congressButton.style.top = '16px'; congressButton.style.right = '10px'; congressButton.onclick = function() { showCongressionalMakeup(hqDiv, questions); } headerDiv.appendChild(congressButton); // Add a button to switch to the Web Browser page let browserButton = document.createElement('button'); browserButton.innerText = 'Conquests & Leaders'; browserButton.style.margin = '5px'; browserButton.style.backgroundColor = 'grey'; browserButton.style.position = 'absolute'; browserButton.style.top = '16px'; browserButton.style.right = '150px'; browserButton.onclick = function () { hqDiv.remove(); openPotentialConquests(); }; headerDiv.appendChild(browserButton); // This is a header text that you can add if you want to. It is not necessary. - Astro let headerText = document.createElement('h3'); headerText.textContent = 'Your Administration'; headerText.style.textColor = 'white'; headerText.style.textAlign = 'center'; headerText.style.flexGrow = '1'; headerText.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; headerText.style.padding = '8px'; headerText.style.borderRadius = '5px'; headerText.classList.add('custom-h3'); headerDiv.appendChild(headerText); // Append headerDiv to the main hqDiv hqDiv.appendChild(headerDiv); // Create a container div for both columns let columnsDiv = document.createElement('div'); columnsDiv.style.display = 'flex'; columnsDiv.style.width = '100%'; // Create inner divs for columns let leftCol = document.createElement('div'); leftCol.style.width = '50%'; leftCol.style.display = 'flex'; // Make left column a flex container leftCol.style.padding = '20px'; leftCol.classList.add('custom-p'); columnsDiv.appendChild(leftCol); // Create container for the card deck and buttons (left side) let cardDeckContainer = document.createElement('div'); cardDeckContainer.style.width = '40%'; cardDeckContainer.style.display = 'flex'; cardDeckContainer.style.flexDirection = 'column'; cardDeckContainer.style.alignItems = 'center'; cardDeckContainer.style.marginRight = '30px'; cardDeckContainer.style.marginLeft = '-30px'; // Create card deck container let deckContainer = document.createElement('div'); deckContainer.style.position = 'relative'; deckContainer.style.width = '150px'; deckContainer.style.height = '200px'; deckContainer.style.marginBottom = '20px'; // Create deck back image let deckBack = document.createElement('img'); deckBack.src = 'https://i.imgur.com/U0l9HXf.png'; // Replace with your deck back image deckBack.style.width = '100%'; deckBack.style.height = '100%'; deckBack.style.objectFit = 'cover'; deckBack.style.borderRadius = '10px'; deckBack.style.border = '3px solid black'; deckBack.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)'; // Create card front image (initially hidden) let currentCardIndex = 0; let cardFront = document.createElement('img'); cardFront.src = ''; // Will be set when cards are defined cardFront.style.position = 'absolute'; cardFront.style.top = '-20px'; cardFront.style.left = '20px'; cardFront.style.width = '100%'; cardFront.style.height = '100%'; cardFront.style.objectFit = 'cover'; cardFront.style.borderRadius = '10px'; cardFront.style.border = '3px solid gold'; cardFront.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)'; cardFront.style.transform = 'rotate(-5deg)'; cardFront.style.transition = 'transform 0.3s ease'; cardFront.style.display = 'none'; deckContainer.appendChild(deckBack); deckContainer.appendChild(cardFront); cardDeckContainer.appendChild(deckContainer); // Add card deck container to left column leftCol.appendChild(cardDeckContainer); // Create card info container (right side of left column) let cardInfoContainer = document.createElement('div'); cardInfoContainer.style.width = '60%'; cardInfoContainer.style.display = 'flex'; cardInfoContainer.style.flexDirection = 'column'; cardInfoContainer.style.alignItems = 'center'; // Card name display let cardNameDisplay = document.createElement('div'); cardNameDisplay.style.textAlign = 'center'; cardNameDisplay.style.marginBottom = '10px'; cardNameDisplay.style.padding = '8px'; cardNameDisplay.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; cardNameDisplay.style.color = 'white'; cardNameDisplay.style.borderRadius = '5px'; cardNameDisplay.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; cardNameDisplay.style.fontSize = '1.2em'; // Card description let cardDescription = document.createElement('div'); cardDescription.style.padding = '10px'; cardDescription.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.6)'; cardDescription.style.color = 'white'; cardDescription.style.borderRadius = '5px'; cardDescription.style.minHeight = '100px'; cardDescription.style.maxHeight = '100px'; cardDescription.style.minWidth = '250px'; cardDescription.style.maxWidth = '250px'; cardDescription.style.border = '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)'; cardDescription.style.marginBottom = '20px'; cardDescription.style.overflowY = 'auto'; cardInfoContainer.appendChild(cardNameDisplay); cardInfoContainer.appendChild(cardDescription); // Create navigation buttons let buttonContainer = document.createElement('div'); buttonContainer.style.display = 'flex'; buttonContainer.style.gap = '20px'; buttonContainer.style.marginBottom = '5px'; buttonContainer.style.justifyContent = 'center'; let prevButton = document.createElement('button'); prevButton.innerText = 'Previous'; prevButton.style.padding = '8px 16px'; prevButton.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; prevButton.style.color = 'white'; prevButton.style.border = 'none'; prevButton.style.borderRadius = '5px'; prevButton.style.cursor = 'pointer'; let nextButton = document.createElement('button'); nextButton.innerText = 'Next'; nextButton.style.padding = '8px 16px'; nextButton.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; nextButton.style.color = 'white'; nextButton.style.border = 'none'; nextButton.style.borderRadius = '5px'; nextButton.style.cursor = 'pointer'; buttonContainer.appendChild(prevButton); buttonContainer.appendChild(nextButton); cardInfoContainer.appendChild(buttonContainer); leftCol.appendChild(cardInfoContainer); // Define your cards data const cards = [ { name: "The Maverick", image: "https://i.imgur.com/85QL4IE.png", description: "John McCain
Only one man in the running to take you on has a career slate as good as yours. Senator John McCain is a fellow war hero and an ideological oddity within the Republican ranks. The Arizona Senator specializes in singing doomsday carols about the situation in the Middle East and our national security. Don't fuel his candidacy." }, { name: "The Commoner", image: "https://i.imgur.com/RlKc5l4.png", description: "Mitt Romney
Deep behind Democratic lines and far from his conservative colleagues sits Governor Mitt Romney. If your total war strategy against the opposition appears successful, he might jump ship and head West, but like a chameleon, he's able to blend in with any background. If Mitt wants the nomination, he'll need the situation abroad to remain consistent; otherwise, his voice will be drowned out by the drums of war." }, { name: "The King", image: "https://i.imgur.com/3fj3ozH.jpeg", description: "Jeb Bush
Some things are just inevitable. The third member of the Bush Dynasty is poised to enter the presidential arena. Whether you choose to continue his brother's crusade in Iraq or leave it behind may influence his decision to bring glory back to the family name." }, { name: "The Hero", image: "https://i.imgur.com/ScqvcbH.png", description: "Rudy Giuliani
Heroes are commonly found in fairy tales or comic books, but in the modern day, you need not look further than America's Mayor. Rudy Giuliani is the torchbearer of the Bush administration, and his campaign for president has already begun. If you rebuke the legacy set by your predecessor, he'll stand at the gates ready to avenge it." }, { name: "The Madman", image: "https://i.imgur.com/BEXPgrK.png", description: "Ron Paul
The Republican Party's establishment infrastructure has collapsed, and while it rebuilds itself, the fringe nuts within are looking to feast upon its absence. Ron Paul spearheads the rageful anti-war, anti-spending, anti-everything movement that is looking to draw blood. If you continue the Bush Administration's worst deeds and jack up the spending, he could build the momentum to take the party by storm." }, { name: "The Hunter", image: "https://i.imgur.com/a3ruglC.png", description: "Mike Huckabee
All studies and polling point to Mike Huckabee becoming your opponent. While the moderate wing of the Republican Party is barely able to stand its ground, the Christian Right is flourishing in cash and headlines. If you take on the issue of gay rights like you often claimed, you'd solidify his position as a hawkish evangelical preacher. Democratic analysts, however, are frothing at the mouth of his potential candidacy, believing his liabilities will serve to make him \"their McGovern.\"" }, { name: "The God Warrior", image: "https://i.imgur.com/T3nwO2g.png", description: "Sam Brownback
Senator Sam Brownback of Kansas is, in fact, a nobody, only mentioned as a highly respectable bipartisan figure because of Landrieu's friendship with the man as part of the Common Ground Coalition. Advisors couldn't pin a path toward the nomination beyond divine intervention. While rags-to-riches stories aren't impossible in politics, this case would need to rapidly transform his politics to make an impact on the national scene." }, { name: "The Storm", image: "https://i.imgur.com/pqnVkir.gif", description: "The Republican National Convention could serve as your last hope of political salvation. Campaign strategists have observed the Republican Party's ideological balance, and the scales often tip in various directions. If you pull them across different ideological spectrums at a rate where no candidate can establish a firm footing, you could cause a deadlock. However, such a strategy could cause the whiplash of your own choices to come back and strike you down.." } ]; // Function to update displayed card function updateCard(index) { if (index >= 0 && index < cards.length) { currentCardIndex = index; const card = cards[currentCardIndex]; cardFront.src = card.image; cardFront.style.display = 'block'; cardNameDisplay.textContent = card.name; cardDescription.innerHTML = card.description; // Disable/enable buttons based on position prevButton.disabled = index === 0; nextButton.disabled = index === cards.length - 1; } } // Button event handlers prevButton.onclick = function() { if (currentCardIndex > 0) { updateCard(currentCardIndex - 1); // Add animation cardFront.style.transform = 'translateX(-20px) rotate(-10deg)'; setTimeout(() => { cardFront.style.transform = 'translateX(0) rotate(-5deg)'; }, 300); } }; nextButton.onclick = function() { if (currentCardIndex < cards.length - 1) { updateCard(currentCardIndex + 1); // Add animation cardFront.style.transform = 'translateX(20px) rotate(0deg)'; setTimeout(() => { cardFront.style.transform = 'translateX(0) rotate(-5deg)'; }, 300); } }; // Initialize with first card updateCard(0) let rightCol = document.createElement('div'); rightCol.style.width = '50%'; columnsDiv.appendChild(rightCol); // Append columnsDiv to the main hqDiv hqDiv.appendChild(columnsDiv); questions.parentNode.insertBefore(hqDiv, questions.nextSibling); // Style the right column for image-text pairs rightCol.style.display = 'flex'; rightCol.style.flexDirection = 'column'; rightCol.style.gap = '30px'; rightCol.classList.add('custom-p'); // First image-text pair (Speaker of the House) let pair1 = document.createElement('div'); pair1.style.display = 'flex'; pair1.style.alignItems = 'center'; pair1.style.gap = '25px'; pair1.style.justifyContent = 'flex-end'; pair1.style.width = '100%'; let img1 = document.createElement('img'); let speakerImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/ujzIE4A.png'; let speakerName = 'Dennis Hastert
Republican - Illinois'; if (typeof speakerDetermined !== 'undefined' && speakerDetermined) { if (Win > 7) { speakerImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/U8Jhc8t.png'; speakerName = 'Nancy Pelosi
Democrat - California
Clever girl'; } else if (Win > 5) { speakerImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/egn6waw.png'; speakerName = 'John Boehner
Republican - Ohio
Pain in the ass'; } else { speakerImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/JDDpRwY.png'; speakerName = 'Roy Blunt
Republican - Missuouri
Obstructionist cuck'; } } img1.src = speakerImage; img1.style.width = '100px'; img1.style.height = 'auto'; img1.style.border = '3px solid black'; img1.style.flexShrink = '0'; let text1 = document.createElement('p'); text1.innerHTML = `Speaker of the House
${speakerName}`; text1.style.color = 'white'; text1.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; text1.style.padding = '8px'; text1.style.borderRadius = '5px'; text1.style.margin = '0'; text1.style.textAlign = 'center'; text1.style.flex = '1'; text1.classList.add('custom-p'); pair1.appendChild(img1); pair1.appendChild(text1); // Second image-text pair (Foe tracker) let pair2 = document.createElement('div'); pair2.style.display = 'flex'; pair2.style.alignItems = 'center'; pair2.style.gap = '25px'; pair2.style.justifyContent = 'flex-end'; pair2.style.width = '100%'; let img2 = document.createElement('img'); let senMajImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/ut5Zwxu.png'; let senMajName = 'Tom Daschle
Democrat - South Dakota'; let senMajLabel = 'Senate Majority Leader'; if (typeof speakerDetermined !== 'undefined' && speakerDetermined) { if (Win < 6){ let senMajImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/UaKDa4o.png'; let senMajName = 'Mitch McConnell
Republican - Kentucky'; } else { let senMajImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/ut5Zwxu.png'; let senMajName = 'Tom Daschle
Democrat - South Dakota'; } } img2.src = senMajImage; img2.style.width = '100px'; img2.style.height = 'auto'; img2.style.border = '3px solid black'; img2.style.flexShrink = '0'; let text2 = document.createElement('p'); text2.innerHTML = `${senMajLabel}
${senMajName}`; text2.style.color = 'white'; text2.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; text2.style.padding = '8px'; text2.style.borderRadius = '5px'; text2.style.margin = '0'; text2.style.textAlign = 'center'; text2.style.flex = '1'; text2.classList.add('custom-p'); pair2.appendChild(img2); pair2.appendChild(text2); // Add the pairs to the right column rightCol.appendChild(pair1); rightCol.appendChild(pair2); } function showCongressionalMakeup() { let questions = document.querySelector(".inner_window_question"); questions.style.display = 'none'; // Hide other parts of the screen const candidatePic = document.getElementById('candidate_pic'); const runningMatePic = document.getElementById('running_mate_pic'); const signDisplay = document.querySelector('.inner_window_sign_display'); if (candidatePic) candidatePic.style.display = 'none'; if (runningMatePic) runningMatePic.style.display = 'none'; if (signDisplay) signDisplay.style.display = 'none'; // Clear any existing Congressional Makeup screen const existingCongressDiv = document.getElementById('headquarter'); if (existingCongressDiv) { existingCongressDiv.remove(); } // Create and set up the Congressional Makeup div let hqDiv = document.createElement('div'); hqDiv.id = 'headquarter'; hqDiv.style.display = 'flex'; hqDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; hqDiv.style.alignItems = 'center'; hqDiv.style.color = 'white'; hqDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#383838'; hqDiv.style.backgroundImage = 'url(https://i.imgur.com/tut7DC0.jpeg)'; hqDiv.style.backgroundSize = 'cover'; hqDiv.style.backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat'; hqDiv.style.border = '5px solid rgb(23, 55, 107)'; hqDiv.style.borderRadius = '10px'; hqDiv.style.height = '85%'; hqDiv.style.position = 'relative'; hqDiv.style.overflow = 'hidden'; // Create header div let headerDiv = document.createElement('div'); headerDiv.style.display = 'flex'; headerDiv.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; headerDiv.style.width = '100%'; headerDiv.style.alignItems = 'center'; // Add a button to switch back to the Administration page let adminButton = document.createElement('button'); adminButton.innerText = 'Your Administration'; adminButton.style.margin = '5px'; adminButton.style.backgroundColor = 'grey'; adminButton.style.position = 'absolute'; adminButton.style.top = '16px'; adminButton.style.left = '10px'; adminButton.onclick = function () { hqDiv.remove(); // Restore hidden elements when switching back to Administration page if (candidatePic) candidatePic.style.display = 'block'; if (runningMatePic) runningMatePic.style.display = 'block'; if (signDisplay) signDisplay.style.display = 'block'; openHeadquarter(); }; headerDiv.appendChild(adminButton); // Add header text let headerText = document.createElement('h3'); headerText.textContent = 'Battle for Olympus'; headerText.style.color = 'white'; headerText.style.textAlign = 'center'; headerText.style.flexGrow = '1'; headerText.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; headerText.style.padding = '8px'; headerText.style.borderRadius = '5px'; headerText.classList.add('custom-h3'); headerDiv.appendChild(headerText); // Append headerDiv to the main hqDiv hqDiv.appendChild(headerDiv); // Create a container div for both columns let columnsDiv = document.createElement('div'); columnsDiv.style.display = 'flex'; columnsDiv.style.width = '100%'; columnsDiv.style.height = '100%'; // Create inner divs for columns let leftCol = document.createElement('div'); leftCol.style.width = '50%'; leftCol.style.textAlign = 'center'; leftCol.style.overflowY = 'auto'; // Add vertical scrollbar if needed leftCol.style.height = '100%'; // Take full height of the parent leftCol.style.padding = '10px'; // Add padding for better spacing columnsDiv.appendChild(leftCol); let rightCol = document.createElement('div'); rightCol.style.width = '75%'; // Take full width of the parent rightCol.style.height = '100%'; // Take full height of the parent rightCol.style.overflowY = 'auto'; // Enable vertical scrolling rightCol.style.overflowX = 'hidden'; // Disable horizontal scrolling rightCol.style.display = 'grid'; rightCol.style.gridTemplateColumns = 'repeat(2, 1fr)'; // 2 columns rightCol.style.gridTemplateRows = 'repeat(4, 1fr)'; // 4 rows rightCol.style.gap = '10px'; // Add gap between grid items rightCol.style.padding = '10px'; // Add padding for better spacing rightCol.style.paddingBottom = '60px'; // Add buffer at the bottom rightCol.style.boxSizing = 'border-box'; columnsDiv.appendChild(rightCol); // Append columnsDiv to the main hqDiv hqDiv.appendChild(columnsDiv); // Add Senate section let senateSection = document.createElement('div'); senateSection.style.marginBottom = '20px'; senateSection.style.marginTop = '0'; // Set to 0 to remove any default margin senateSection.style.paddingTop = '0'; senateSection.style.position = 'relative'; // Add Senate image let senateImg = document.createElement('img'); let senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/qqLWi7A.png'; // Default image if (speakerDetermined == true) { console.log("Speaker is determined. Checking Win conditions..."); console.log("Win value:", Win); console.log("Schiavo value:", Schiavo); if (Win > 9) { console.log("Win over 9"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/aqMjWQI.png'; } else if (Win > 8 && Win <= 9) { console.log("Win over 8"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/Q7JMn7F.png'; } else if (Win > 7 && Win <= 8) { console.log("Win over 7"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/vOOfSGt.png'; } else if (Win > 6 && Win <= 7 && e.player_answers.includes(20752)) { // Not helping Lamont console.log("Win over 6, no help to Lamont"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/C53V6mW.png'; } else if (Win > 6 && Win <= 7 && (e.player_answers.includes(5184) || e.player_answers.includes(20755))) { // Helping Lamont console.log("Win over 6, help Lamont"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/7rDgCSE.png'; } else if (Win > 5 && Win <= 6 && e.player_answers.includes(20752)) { // Not helping Lamont console.log("Win over 5, no Lamont"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/PwpZLM0.png'; } else if (Win > 5 && Win <= 6 && (e.player_answers.includes(5184) || e.player_answers.includes(20755))) { // Helping Lamont console.log("Win over 5, Lamont"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/eT7WMa6.png'; } else if (Win > 4 && Win <= 5 && Schiavo == 1) { console.log("Win over 4, Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/Seyd90G.png'; } else if (Win > 4 && Win <= 5 && Schiavo == 0) { console.log("Win over 4, no Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/di3LO4k.png'; } else if (Win > 3 && Win <= 4 && Schiavo == 1) { console.log("Win over 3, Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/o3eQEkG.png'; } else if (Win > 3 && Win <= 4 && Schiavo == 0) { console.log("Win over 3, no Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/L5Q5k1R.png'; } else if (Win > 2 && Win <= 3 && Schiavo == 1) { console.log("Win over 2, Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/2b9KFgd.png'; } else if (Win > 2 && Win <= 3 && Schiavo == 0) { console.log("Win over 2, no Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/XojZ27U.png'; } else if (Win > 1 && Win <= 2 && Schiavo == 1) { console.log("Win over 1, Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/IQ9OpeD.png'; } else if (Win > 1 && Win <= 2 && Schiavo == 0) { console.log("Win over 1, no Schiavo"); senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/iBvIfuM.png'; } else if (Win > 0 && Win <= 1) { console.log("Win over 0") senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/3Z8gtpY.png'; } else if (Win <= 0) { senateImage = 'https://i.imgur.com/93YSbjl.png'; } } // Set the image source and styles senateImg.src = senateImage; senateImg.style.width = '95%'; senateImg.style.height = 'auto'; senateImg.style.border = ''; senateImg.style.position = 'absolute'; senateImg.style.top = '80px'; senateImg.style.left = '10px'; // Add the image to the Senate section senateSection.appendChild(senateImg); leftCol.appendChild(senateSection); // Add a header above the array of images let challengersHeader = document.createElement('h3'); challengersHeader.textContent = 'Challengers'; challengersHeader.style.color = 'white'; challengersHeader.style.textAlign = 'center'; challengersHeader.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; challengersHeader.style.padding = '8px'; challengersHeader.style.borderRadius = '5px'; challengersHeader.style.marginBottom = '10px'; // Add spacing below the header challengersHeader.style.gridColumn = '1 / -1'; // Make the header span all columns challengersHeader.classList.add('custom-h3'); rightCol.appendChild(challengersHeader); let secondHeader = document.createElement('h3'); secondHeader.textContent = 'Incumbents'; // Default text if (speakerDetermined == true) { secondHeader.textContent = 'Survivors'; challengersHeader.textContent = 'Victors'; // Update text based on condition } // Array of image URLs for the first 12 images let imageUrls = []; let secondImageUrls = []; if (speakerDetermined == true) { console.log("Speaker is determined. Checking Win conditions..."); if (Win > 9) { console.log("Win over 9"); imageUrls = [ 'https://i.imgur.com/a4Bsjcg.png', // Lamont, D-Connecticut 'https://i.imgur.com/fhBvpvm.png', // Casey, D-Pennsylvania 'https://i.imgur.com/ipU7Gk0.png', // Brown, D-Ohio 'https://i.imgur.com/xZW7MZi.png', // Whitehouse, D-Rhode Island 'https://i.imgur.com/5oFYCSu.png', // Carnahan, D-Missouri 'https://i.imgur.com/RqH3OTD.png', // Tester, D-Montana 'https://i.imgur.com/60P1KBP.png', // Webb, D-Virginia 'https://i.imgur.com/WRbZOFY.png', // Ford, D-Tennessee 'https://i.imgur.com/BEGAaC4.png', // Pederson, D-Arizona loss 'https://i.imgur.com/BEGAaC4.png', // Carter, D-Nevada loss 'https://i.imgur.com/BEGAaC4.png', // Fleming, D-Mississippi loss 'https://i.imgur.com/BEGAaC4.png' // Radnofsky, D-Texas loss ]; secondImageUrls = [ 'https://i.imgur.com/5fXOlSa.png', // Kennedy 'https://i.imgur.com/lGxrOWv.png', // Byrd 'https://i.imgur.com/uJvTXLo.png', // Clinton 'https://i.imgur.com/jAqi1kT.png', // Feinstein 'https://i.imgur.com/fdsnCdq.png', // Akaka 'https://i.imgur.com/fBNDW8u.png', // Bingaman 'https://i.imgur.com/kn5F6ps.png', // Sarbanes 'https://i.imgur.com/IdvgtZQ.png', // Kohl 'https://i.imgur.com/1gLFvuC.png', // Carper 'https://i.imgur.com/M6eKLPM.png', // Stabenow 'https://i.imgur.com/PukFyua.png', // Cantwell 'https://i.imgur.com/k2LzbZg.png', // Dayton 'https://i.imgur.com/BrBpvlH.png', // Corzine 'https://i.imgur.com/6gaOorE.png', // Bill Nelson 'https://i.imgur.com/CqqY3Uz.png', // Ben Nelson 'https://i.imgur.com/7SgBfTQ.png' // Conrad ]; secondHeader.style.padding = '8px'; secondHeader.style.borderRadius = '5px'; secondHeader.style.marginBottom = '10px'; // Add spacing below the header secondHeader.style.gridColumn = '1 / -1'; // Make the header span all columns secondHeader.classList.add('custom-h3'); rightCol.appendChild(secondHeader); // Add the second set of images secondImageUrls.forEach(url => { let img = document.createElement('img'); img.src = url; img.style.width = '100%'; img.style.height = 'auto'; img.style.border = 'none'; img.style.objectFit = 'contain'; rightCol.appendChild(img); }); // Insert the Congressional Makeup screen into the DOM questions.parentNode.insertBefore(hqDiv, questions.nextSibling); } function openPotentialConquests() { let questions = document.querySelector(".inner_window_question"); questions.style.display = 'none'; const candidatePic = document.getElementById('candidate_pic'); const runningMatePic = document.getElementById('running_mate_pic'); const signDisplay = document.querySelector('.inner_window_sign_display'); if (candidatePic) candidatePic.style.display = 'none'; if (runningMatePic) runningMatePic.style.display = 'none'; if (signDisplay) signDisplay.style.display = 'none'; // Remove previous version if it exists const existingDiv = document.getElementById('conquests_browser'); if (existingDiv) existingDiv.remove(); // Create main container let conquestDiv = document.createElement('div'); conquestDiv.id = 'conquests_browser'; conquestDiv.style.display = 'flex'; conquestDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; conquestDiv.style.alignItems = 'center'; conquestDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#383838'; conquestDiv.style.backgroundImage = 'url(https://i.imgur.com/4Bj7T6b.gif)'; conquestDiv.style.backgroundSize = 'cover'; conquestDiv.style.border = '5px solid rgb(23, 55, 107)'; conquestDiv.style.borderRadius = '10px'; conquestDiv.style.height = '80%'; conquestDiv.style.margin = 'auto'; conquestDiv.style.overflow = 'hidden auto'; conquestDiv.style.color = 'white'; conquestDiv.style.position = 'relative'; conquestDiv.style.padding = '10px'; // Header + return button let header = document.createElement('div'); header.style.display = 'flex'; header.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; header.style.width = '100%'; let returnButton = document.createElement('button'); returnButton.innerText = 'Your Administration'; returnButton.style.margin = '5px'; returnButton.style.backgroundColor = 'grey'; returnButton.style.position = 'absolute'; returnButton.style.top = '12px'; returnButton.style.left = '10px'; returnButton.onclick = function () { conquestDiv.remove(); // Restore hidden elements when switching back to Administration page if (candidatePic) candidatePic.style.display = 'block'; if (runningMatePic) runningMatePic.style.display = 'block'; if (signDisplay) signDisplay.style.display = 'block'; openHeadquarter(); }; header.appendChild(returnButton); conquestDiv.appendChild(header); // Create main content container with two columns let mainContentContainer = document.createElement('div'); mainContentContainer.style.display = 'flex'; mainContentContainer.style.width = '100%'; mainContentContainer.style.overflowX = 'hidden'; mainContentContainer.style.gap = '20px'; mainContentContainer.style.padding = '1px'; // Left column - Conquest Cards let conquestsColumn = document.createElement('div'); conquestsColumn.style.display = 'flex'; conquestsColumn.style.flexDirection = 'column'; conquestsColumn.style.flex = '1'; conquestsColumn.style.width = '60%'; conquestsColumn.style.gap = '1px'; // Right column - Leaders let leadersColumn = document.createElement('div'); leadersColumn.style.display = 'flex'; leadersColumn.style.flexDirection = 'column'; leadersColumn.style.width = '40%'; leadersColumn.style.flexShrink = '0'; leadersColumn.style.gap = '1px'; // Create vertical container for cards let cardsContainer = document.createElement('div'); cardsContainer.style.display = 'flex'; cardsContainer.style.flexDirection = 'column'; cardsContainer.style.gap = '20px'; cardsContainer.style.width = '100%'; cardsContainer.style.padding = '1px'; cardsContainer.style.overflowY = 'auto'; // Function to determine rating style function getRatingStyle(rating) { const styles = { "Respectable": { color: '#00ff00', backgroundColor: '#003300', border: '1px solid #00ff00' }, "Likely": { color: '#aaff00', backgroundColor: '#334400', border: '1px solid #aaff00' }, "Uninspired": { color: '#ffff00', backgroundColor: '#444400', border: '1px solid #ffff00' }, "Ambitious": { color: '#ff6600', backgroundColor: '#442200', border: '1px solid #ff6600' }, "Unlikely": { color: '#ff0000', backgroundColor: '#440000', border: '1px solid #ff0000' } }; return styles[rating] || {}; } let conquestsTitle = document.createElement('h3'); conquestsTitle.innerText = "Conquests"; conquestsTitle.style.color = 'white'; conquestsTitle.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; conquestsTitle.style.margin = '0 0 10px 0'; conquestsTitle.style.width = '100%'; conquestsTitle.style.textAlign = 'center'; conquestsTitle.style.padding = '8px'; conquestsTitle.style.borderRadius = '5px'; conquestsTitle.classList.add('custom-h3'); conquestsColumn.appendChild(conquestsTitle); // Function to create conquest cards function createConquestCard(imageUrl, description, billName, rating) { let card = document.createElement('div'); card.style.display = 'flex'; card.style.alignItems = 'flex-start'; card.style.background = 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f9ff, #e0f2fe)'; card.style.border = '1px solid #bae6fd'; card.style.padding = '10px'; card.style.width = '100%'; card.style.boxSizing = 'border-box'; card.style.borderRadius = '8px'; card.style.boxShadow = '0 2px 5px rgba(2, 132, 199, 0.1)'; card.style.position = 'relative'; // Add subtle blue accent in corner let cornerAccent = document.createElement('div'); cornerAccent.style.position = 'absolute'; cornerAccent.style.top = '0'; cornerAccent.style.right = '0'; cornerAccent.style.width = '40px'; cornerAccent.style.height = '40px'; cornerAccent.style.background = 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(2, 132, 199, 0.2) 50%, transparent 50%)'; card.appendChild(cornerAccent); // Left column (image + rating) let leftColumn = document.createElement('div'); leftColumn.style.display = 'flex'; leftColumn.style.flexDirection = 'column'; leftColumn.style.flexShrink = '0'; leftColumn.style.marginLeft = '10px'; leftColumn.style.width = '220px'; leftColumn.style.alignItems = 'center'; leftColumn.style.zIndex = '1'; // Image with blue border let imgContainer = document.createElement('div'); imgContainer.style.width = '200px'; imgContainer.style.height = '200px'; imgContainer.style.borderRadius = '6px'; imgContainer.style.overflow = 'hidden'; imgContainer.style.border = '2px solid #bae6fd'; imgContainer.style.background = '#f0f9ff'; let img = document.createElement('img'); img.src = imageUrl; img.alt = 'Bill image'; img.style.width = '100%'; img.style.height = '100%'; img.style.objectFit = 'cover'; imgContainer.appendChild(img); leftColumn.appendChild(imgContainer); // Rating badge with blue gradient let ratingStyle = getRatingStyle(rating); let ratingContainer = document.createElement('div'); ratingContainer.style.display = 'flex'; ratingContainer.style.alignItems = 'center'; ratingContainer.style.justifyContent = 'center'; ratingContainer.style.marginTop = '15px'; ratingContainer.style.padding = '6px 15px'; ratingContainer.style.borderRadius = '20px'; ratingContainer.style.fontWeight = '600'; ratingContainer.style.fontSize = '14px'; ratingContainer.style.boxShadow = '0 2px 4px rgba(2, 132, 199, 0.2)'; Object.assign(ratingContainer.style, ratingStyle); ratingContainer.innerText = rating; leftColumn.appendChild(ratingContainer); card.appendChild(leftColumn); // Right column (text content) let rightColumn = document.createElement('div'); rightColumn.style.display = 'flex'; rightColumn.style.flexDirection = 'column'; rightColumn.style.flexGrow = '1'; rightColumn.style.zIndex = '1'; // Bill name with permanent blue underline let name = document.createElement('h3'); name.innerText = billName; name.style.fontWeight = '600'; name.style.fontSize = '20px'; name.style.margin = '0 0 15px 0'; name.style.color = '#0369a1'; name.style.position = 'relative'; name.style.paddingBottom = '8px'; // Permanent underline with blue gradient let underline = document.createElement('div'); underline.style.position = 'absolute'; underline.style.bottom = '0'; underline.style.left = '0'; underline.style.width = '100%'; underline.style.height = '2px'; underline.style.background = 'linear-gradient(90deg, #0284c7, #38bdf8)'; underline.style.borderRadius = '2px'; name.appendChild(underline); rightColumn.appendChild(name); // Description text let desc = document.createElement('p'); desc.innerText = description; desc.style.margin = '0'; desc.style.fontSize = '15px'; desc.style.lineHeight = '1.5'; desc.style.color = '#334155'; rightColumn.appendChild(desc); card.appendChild(rightColumn); return card; } const exampleCards = [ ]; if (e.player_answers.includes(5148)) { //clean air plan exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/yCV04P0.gif', description: 'Enacted by the 109th Congress, Sponsored by Markey, Edward [D-MA, 1976-????]. Setting limits on the four major pollutants from power plants and establishing new programs to reduce airborne toxins and carcinogens. Initially, a cap-and-trade system provision was proposed to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, but it was pulled from the bill to ensure its passage.', billName: 'The Airborne Threat Reduction and Environmental Security Act of 2005 (ATRESA)', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(5149)) { //peace corps exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'peace corps', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(24794)) { //atlantic charter exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/ldqPE50.gif', description: 'Enacted by the Clark Administration, negotiated by Secretary of State John Kerry [D-MA, 2005-????]. Established a renewed NATO commitment to combating terrorism, creating an extension of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty which binds NATO to sanction a state breaking any provision of the treaty.', billName: 'New Atlantic Charter (NAC)', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(20897)) { //fma exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'freedom to marry act', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(20890)) { //axe bush tax cuts exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'tax reform', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(22670)) { //nclb reform exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'no child left behind reform', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(255248)) { //nasa exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'light speed', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(22460)) { //cybersecurity exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'cybersecurity', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(20935)) { //matthew shepard act exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'matthew shepard act', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(22479) || e.player_answers.includes(24704)) { //gun reform exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'gun reform', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(24730)) { //assault weapons ban exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'assault weapons ban', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(20943)) { //prescriptions exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/ZpfXEJv.gif', description: 'Enacted by the 110th Congress, Sponsored by Byron Dorgon [D-ND, 1992-????]. Removed trade limits on FDA-approved drugs from Canada. Passed to lower prescription drug costs in America and criticized by pharmaceutical companies for lowering supply chain integrity.', billName: 'Prescription Drug Cost Defense Act (PDCDA)', rating: 'Uninspired' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(22483)) { //basic clarkcare exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/r9N0SN2.gif', description: 'Enacted by the 110th Congress, sponsored by Neal, Richard [D-MA2, 1989-2012] providing an individual mandate amending the Public Health Service Act of 1944 and inserted new provisions on affordable care into Title 42 of the United States Code. Regulating individual insurance markets and expanding Medicare and Medicaid Coverage.', billName: 'The Strategic Health Access and Affordability Act (SHAAA)', rating: 'Respectable' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(24734)) { //universal clarkcare exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/02BTIx8.gif', description: 'Enacted by the 110th Congress, Sponsored by Rangel, Charles [D–NY, 1971-2017] Providing both an Individual and Public option mandate amending the Public Health Service Act of 1944 and inserted new provisions on affordable care into Title 42 of the United States Code. Massively overhauling individual Insurance Markets and introducing a state funded health insurance agency that will compete with other private health insurance agencies across America.', billName: 'The Public Health Protections and Defense Act', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(23772)) { //card check exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/6QGTgup.gif', description: 'Enacted by the 110th Congress, Sponsored by Tom Harkin [D-IA, 1985-????]. Allows unions to bypass a standard secret ballot election and unionize if over 50% of workers in a facility sign a card approving the measure. Fiercely criticized by employers especially for section 3 of the bill which forces an employer to collectively bargain with the newly formed union within 10 days of its formation.', billName: 'The Card Check Mobilization Act', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(24635)) { //universal pre k exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'universal pre k', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(23781)) { //Homeland and Hometown Security Fund exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'Homeland and Hometown Security Fund', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(25093)) { //invade iran exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'invade iran', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (Econ == 1) { //weak econ bill exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'weak econ bill', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (Econ == 2) { //your econ bill exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'your econ bill', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (Econ == 3) { //clinton econ bill exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/e9BmPq4.gif', description: 'Enacted by the 110th Congress, Sponsored by Clinton, Hillary [D-NY, 2001-????]. Establishing a Troubled Assets Relief Program (TARP) whose funds would purchase toxic assets from failing banks. The bill would also reestablish the New Deal Era, Home Owners’ Loan Corporation which would refinance failing mortgages while a moratorium on foreclosures was put in place.', billName: 'Emergency Economic and Housing Stabilization Act', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (Econ == 4) { //bernie econ bill exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'bernie econ bill', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(24183)) { //kill osama exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'kill osama', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(255057)) { //free college exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'free college', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(255054)) { //2 trilly stimmy exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: '2 trilly stimmy', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } if (e.player_answers.includes(255060)) { //minimum wage exampleCards.push({ imageUrl: ' ', description: ' ', billName: 'minimum wage', rating: 'Ambitious' }); } exampleCards.forEach(card => { cardsContainer.appendChild(createConquestCard( card.imageUrl, card.description, card.billName, card.rating )); }); conquestsColumn.appendChild(cardsContainer); // --- Foreign Leaders Card Section --- let leadersTitle = document.createElement('h3'); leadersTitle.innerText = "Foreign Leaders"; leadersTitle.style.color = 'white'; leadersTitle.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(23, 55, 107, 0.8)'; leadersTitle.style.margin = '0 0 10px 0'; leadersTitle.style.width = '100%'; leadersTitle.style.textAlign = 'center'; leadersTitle.style.padding = '8px'; leadersTitle.style.borderRadius = '5px'; leadersTitle.classList.add('custom-h3'); leadersColumn.appendChild(leadersTitle); let leadersContainer = document.createElement('div'); leadersContainer.style.display = 'flex'; leadersContainer.style.flexDirection = 'column'; leadersContainer.style.gap = '10px'; leadersContainer.style.padding = '1px'; leadersContainer.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.7)'; leadersContainer.style.borderRadius = '1px'; leadersContainer.style.overflow = 'hidden auto'; leadersContainer.style.border = '1px solid #0284c7'; // Function to create leader card function createLeaderCard(imgUrl, nameTitle, alignment, description) { let card = document.createElement('div'); card.style.display = 'flex'; card.style.flexDirection = 'column'; card.style.alignItems = 'center'; card.style.backgroundColor = '#1e293b'; card.style.border = '2px solid #0284c7'; card.style.borderRadius = '1px'; card.style.padding = '5px'; // Reduced from 1px card.style.color = 'white'; // Explicit white text card.style.boxShadow = '0 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)'; card.style.width = '100%'; let img = document.createElement('img'); img.src = imgUrl; img.alt = nameTitle; img.style.width = '140px'; // Increased from 120px img.style.height = '160px'; // Increased from 120px (taller aspect ratio) img.style.borderRadius = '6px'; img.style.objectFit = 'cover'; img.style.border = '2px solid #0284c7'; card.appendChild(img); let name = document.createElement('p'); name.innerText = nameTitle; name.style.marginTop = '8px'; // Reduced from 10px name.style.fontWeight = '600'; name.style.fontSize = '16px'; name.style.textAlign = 'center'; name.style.color = 'white'; // Explicit white text name.classList.add('custom-p'); card.appendChild(name); let desc = document.createElement('p'); desc.innerText = description; desc.style.marginTop = '6px'; desc.style.padding = '0 5px'; desc.style.fontSize = '14px'; desc.style.textAlign = 'center'; desc.style.color = 'white'; desc.classList.add('custom-p'); card.appendChild(desc); let status = document.createElement('div'); status.innerText = alignment; status.style.marginTop = '6px'; status.style.padding = '4px 8px'; status.style.borderRadius = '20px'; status.style.fontWeight = '500'; status.style.fontSize = '14px'; status.style.backgroundColor = alignment === 'Loyal Subordinate' ? '#16a34a' : '#dc2626'; status.style.color = 'white'; card.appendChild(status); return card; } // Determine leaders based on variables let currentLeaders = []; // Britain if (Blair == 1) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/Daa6zqm.gif', nameTitle: 'Prime Minister Tony Blair - UK', alignment: 'Loyal Subordinate', description: 'Despite a few hiccups from 2005 and pressure from Brown to resign, Tony Blair has fought and clawed his way up from near oblivion. Whether he can continue the fight in 2010 is another question.' }); } else if (Brown == 1) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/hgyMAWf.gif', nameTitle: 'Prime Minister Gordon Brown - UK', alignment: 'Hesitant Merchant', description: 'The new Prime Minister has made a name for himself thus far as indecisive. After witnessing American foreign policy rip his party to shreds, he\'s looking to create distance. You won\'t be able to bounce around him like you did Blair. Gordon Brown is a man of intellect who is not afraid to browse through a library or two to find a solution.' }); } else if (Brown == 2) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/GdWenQ5.gif', nameTitle: 'Prime Minister Gordon Brown - UK', alignment: 'Loyal Subordinate', description: 'After leading his party to a steady victory in 2007, Gordon Brown feels confident and generous. With a 4th Labour term secured, he\'s surely willing to work with you when you call for help. In these uncertain times, that\'s the most you can hope for.' }); } else { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/1LfXEqw.gif', nameTitle: 'Prime Minister Tony Blair - UK', alignment: 'Hesitant Merchant', description: 'The man stuck in the shadow of his prime. Tony Blair has long been burnt and left for dead by the Bush Administration, but if you give him some time and room to grow, he can be useful.' }); } // France if (Sarkozy == 1) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/PSzFRdX.gif', nameTitle: 'President Nicolas Sarkozy - France', alignment: 'Hesitant Merchant', description: 'Good old Sarkozy is just what we needed to rebalance the West and get a man looking to fix problems instead of shouting about them. He\'s a negotiator, someone willing to strengthen ties with us.' }); } else if (Royal == 1) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/CdGPuES.gif', nameTitle: 'President Ségolène Royal - France', alignment: 'Unwilling Vassal', description: 'Nightmare, this is an utter nightmare; Royal is a walking bomb ready to explode in the West. Hailing from the French Socialist Party, she won the 2007 election partly on a promise of obstruction. Hoping to sink your agenda, she\'s stacked all her bets on stopping you' }); } else { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/6yJourJ.gif', nameTitle: 'President Jacques Chirac - France', alignment: 'Unwilling Vassal', description: 'Since the dawn of his second term, President Chiraq has done nothing but oppose and impede American ventures. He opposed the Bush Administration\'s conduct in Iraq and is in bed with Putin on weekends. He\'s a problem, but maybe his successor will change course.' }); } // Turkey if (Gul == 1) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/8ZP60vh.gif', nameTitle: 'President Abdullah Gül - Turkey', alignment: 'Hesitant Merchant', description: 'Forced to accept American meddling in regions he hopes to influence, President Gül has made it his job to ensure his country\'s benefit first. If you plan to barter with him, you\'d better make a good offer he can\'t help but take.' }); } else { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/YVFXRLs.gif', nameTitle: 'President Ahmet Necdet Sezer - Turkey', alignment: 'Hesitant Merchant', description: 'Turkey was naturally the closest ally to the wars Bush waged in the Middle East. Over the span of his presidency, Sezer gave a quiet nod to American foreign policy and struck an indecisive tone about where he stood when confronted by you. He\'s not a problem unless you make him one.' }); } // Germany if (Merkel == 1) { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/5NSefzA.gif', nameTitle: 'Chancellor Angela Merkel - Germany', alignment: 'Hesitant Merchant', description: 'Merkel was the likely successor to Schröder\'s failures, but her party\'s performance disappointed expectations despite that. Forced to lead a Grand Coalition with the SPD, she\'s likely reluctant to follow you in making any bold moves.' }); } else { currentLeaders.push({ imgUrl: 'https://i.imgur.com/eBq8nF9.gif', nameTitle: 'Chancellor Gerhard Schröder - Germany', alignment: 'Unwilling Vassal', description: 'Bush made him nothing short of an enemy of the West under his leadership, and if your history shows anything, it\'s that you and Schröder are likely to butt heads in the future. Especially once you begin targeting Russia and the oil that he\'s worked so hard to secure.' }); } // Add leaders to container currentLeaders.forEach(leader => { leadersContainer.appendChild(createLeaderCard( leader.imgUrl, leader.nameTitle, leader.alignment, leader.description )); }); // Add container to column leadersColumn.appendChild(leadersContainer); mainContentContainer.appendChild(conquestsColumn); mainContentContainer.appendChild(leadersColumn); conquestDiv.appendChild(mainContentContainer); // Insert into DOM questions.parentNode.insertBefore(conquestDiv, questions.nextSibling); } function handleMutations(mutationsList, observer) { if (observerRunning) return; observerRunning = true; addHeadquarterButton(); addStatsPopupButton(); observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true }); observerRunning = false; } let observerRunning = false; var element = document.getElementById('controlElement'); if (!element) { let singleObserver = new MutationObserver(handleMutations); singleObserver.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true }); var controlElement = document.createElement('div'); controlElement.style.display = 'none'; controlElement.id = 'controlElement'; document.body.appendChild(controlElement); }
